DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to develop a small, easily used device to detect a person's blood flow in their fingertips.
DOC.brief_title: Finger Imaging to Detect Blood Flow in the Fingertips
DOC.detailed_description: To develop a hand held touch-pad device for identification of individuals, to help with banking and, possibly for detection of anxiety. This is done by their fingerprint and, other digital anatomy and vascular biometrics.
DOC.criteria: Adult male and female who can give informed consent Under the age of 18
